collection:
This Privacy Policy outlines how we
collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your personal information when you
interact with our API.

Personal Information:

We do not collect any personal information directly from the users when a
custom GPT interacts with our API.

Usage Information:

We may collect certain usage information automatically when a custom GPT
interacts with our API.

This usage information may include the access time and
date and the technical information about the interactions.

Personal Information:

Since we do not collect any personal information from the users, we do not use
it for any purpose.

Usage Information:

We may use the usage information collected from the custom GPT for the
following purposes:

  * a) To analyze and improve the performance and functionality of our API.

Personal Information:

Since we do not collect any personal information from the users, we do not
disclose it to any third parties.
sharing:
Personal Information:

Since we do not collect any personal information from the users, we do not
disclose it to any third parties.

Usage Information:

We may disclose the usage information collected from the custom GPT to the
following parties:

  * a) Service Providers: We may engage third-party service providers to assist us in analyzing and improving our API.
These service providers will have access to the usage information but are obligated to maintain the confidentiality and security of the information.

* b) Legal Requirements: We may disclose the usage information if required to do so by law or in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to comply with legal obligations or protect and defend our rights or property.
